section.title: Agent Authentication Module
section.para: There are several agent authentication modules (DB, LDAP and HTTPBasicAuth) which come with the OTRS framework. It is also possible to develop your own authentication modules. The agent authentication modules are located under Kernel/System/Auth/*.pm. For more information about their configuration see the admin manual. Following, there is an example of a simple agent auth module. Save it under Kernel/System/Auth/Simple.pm. You just need 3 functions: new(), GetOption() and Auth(). Return the uid, then the authentication is ok.
